channel.title: Duping
channel.description: Hello, im a moderator of the new server called Hyperscape and the coder is offline, and we have 3 ways to dupe on the server, one with the duel arena, one monster and one altar. The duel arena you just show a noted item into the trade, cancel and they have as many items as possible, or something of the line. The monster one is where you attack a rock crab, drop the item, close client, go on second account, pick up item and the item is in inv aswell, unsure about the altar one as not being given details, disabled trading until these errors are resolved, any ideas? thanks

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

The rock crab one is because of the rollback, so fix the rollback obviously.
Make sure the character gets saved in it’s state right before disconnecting.

Read full topic

Noo we need help first, add me on skype rwalker97 pleasee…

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @johnny1223 johnny1223
item.description:
@johnny1223 wrote:

Hmmm, well first off shut down duel arena until you fix it, second of all I believe there is a way to make it impossible to stake noted items in the code, but my co-owner takes care of that type of stuff, so look into trying to write in code that nulls the possibility to stake noted items.
